p: Nodules are defined as rounded focal opacities measuring less than 3 cm, with or without calcifications that can be solid, partially solid, or only presenting ground-glass attenuation ( 11) . These can be observed in viral pneumonia and have been reported in 3-13% of COVID-19 pneumonia cases ( 8, 18, 22) , with some demonstrating a surrounding ground-glass zone that forms the halo sign ( 8, 23, 24) .
